title: Realms of the Russian bear
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Soviet Union - Description and travel
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: From the Volga Delta to the mighty Russian Far East, from huge smoking volcanoes to cold icy coasts, take an incredible journey of exploration into the wildlife and countryside of one of the world's most remarkable areas. Wildfowl and water birds, leopards and tigers, wild asses and Polar Bears - all are here amongst the amazing variety of creatures befitting this huge, little explored area. Presented by Russian naturalist Nikolai Drozdov, this spectacular award-winning BBC series is a visual feast for all nature lovers.
